description: Pivot that tries to revert completed work - creates a reversion sub-issue

analysis.change_summary: User wants to remove the OAuth implementation that was already completed

new_sub_issues.title: [Reversion] Remove OAuth2 implementation
new_sub_issues.description:
## Description

User requested removal of OAuth2 implementation that was already completed.

## Background

The original implementation added OAuth2 authentication, but it's no longer needed.

## Scope

Remove all OAuth2-related code and dependencies.
todos: Update tests to remove OAuth2 tests

output.summary_for_user: Cannot modify completed work directly. Created a new sub-issue '[Reversion] Remove OAuth2 implementation' to handle removing the OAuth2 functionality.
